Question
========
  
Factor analysis is a technique we use for several reasons. What are two main purposes of factor analysis?


Answerlist
----------
* Find data reduction and subscales
* Determine data reduction and reliability
* Determine dimensionality and establish reliability
* Create scales and determine internal consistency
